title: IUCAA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Assistant Posts
description: The Inter University Centre for Astronomy and Astrophysics (IUCAA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, and B.Sc can apply for the IUCAA Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, se...
